fws_master
Class SlaveInputBinding

java.lang.Object
  fws_master.Binding
      fws_master.SlaveInputBinding

public class SlaveInputBinding
extends Binding

Allows binding a InputParameter to a Slave. This Parameter will be received from the slave. A InputBinding can have multiple plots configured.

Author:
Johannes Kasberger

setPlotConfig

public boolean setPlotConfig(java.lang.String plotConfig)
This config is checked for valid syntax. Then it's split into its separate plots and saved in a collection.

plotConfig - the plotConfig to set
